definition: ten thousand crags and torrents (idiom); the trials and tribulations of a long journey/a long and difficult road
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: We write to each other often, even though we are a great distance apart.
sentences.chinese: 即使是相隔萬水千山，我們也頻繁書信往來。

sentences.english: We have all come a long way, "ten thousand crags and torrents" (a long and difficult road) to get here.
sentences.chinese: 我們都來自五湖四海，經歷萬水千山，來到了這裏。

sentences.english: Then I could fly across mountains and rivers to rest on a bough before your window.
sentences.chinese: 可以飛越萬水千山，停在你窗前的樹梢。

sentences.english: Even numerous mountains and rivers cannot separate our friendship.
sentences.chinese: 縱然是萬水千山也隔不斷我們的情誼。

sentences.english: "Is not afraid of red army expedition difficult, the long march only afford".
sentences.chinese: “紅軍不怕遠征難，萬水千山只等閒”。

sentences.english: Once you have drunk the water of Nile, you will always come back.
sentences.chinese: 一朝淺飲尼羅水，萬水千山總戀她。

sentences.english: Only afford is not afraid of red army expedition difficult, the long march.
sentences.chinese: 榥“紅軍不怕遠征難，萬水千山只等閒。”

sentences.english: Fly over mountains and rivers before I stop at a twig in front of your window.
sentences.chinese: 可以飛越萬水千山，停在你窗前的樹梢。

sentences.english: The reds fear expedition difficult, vast wounds only.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍不怕遠征難，萬水千山只等閒。

definition: a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
